title: jamie_c
author: jamie_c
content: Greetings,ASIC Hosting Canada offers competitive solutions for miner hosting. We first launched our 6MW facility in 2018 and have been hosting miners ever since. We have a current capacity of 1.8MW available for mining.Here is a list of services we offer:-Miner maintenance (repairs on site)-Miner monitoring 24/7-Secure hosting environment-Secure network-Highly ventilated facility-CSA approvedwww.asichostingcanada.comPlease feel free to send us your hosting requirements and we will be glad to assist you.Thank you.
